entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beauceville 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: SW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers or flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
